column7: (G. clarkei Kashmir Purple x G. pratense)
column9: A lovely new hybrid which combines strong growth and beautiful finely divided foliage with amply  produced large deep clear blue flowers; each paler in the centre. 60cm. (G.pratense x G. Kashmir Purple)
